summary: A newly married couple arrives at the home of the husband's late wife, where the gardens have been maintained by a gardener faithful to the dead woman's memory. Soon, eerie events lead the new wife to think she's losing her mind.
cast: John Hudson|Peggy Webber|Russ Conway|Tony Johnson|Alex Nicol
keywords: psychotronic film|mercedes coupe|mercedes benz gullwing|water lily|empty room
title: The Screaming Skull
